title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Making friends with Thor – Lodi, Wisconsin
content:
Support us! BikeRumor may earn a small commission from affiliate links in this article. Learn more.

Photo submitted by Charles Sholdt, “Taken during a crisp fall morning outside of Lodi, Wisconsin, near Dane and Wuanakee. Great 40-mile ride through the Driftless terrain of south central Wisconsin. The goat, Thor, stays along the road to keep the grass and weeds down. He and I have gotten to be pals because I need to stop right where he is for a drink of water and he because I bring him apples and carrots. This is very cool.”

We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here on the Pic Of The Day. Send in your pics with a description here.
author: Kristi Benedict
